website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 delivers power and personality in a compact form unlike anything else currently on the market. AMD's latest and greatest 4000-series Ryzen architecture, along with the impressive graphical clout of Nvidia's GeForce RTX 2060 Max-Q make for a winning combination.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because of the fan exhaust placement, they just heat your cables and mouse plugged in the USBs. Also the charging port should be closer to the screen, it`s awkward to have a external HDMi monitor and the AC Adapter plugged in. All in all is a well built laptop with a powerful config
customer_reviews.author: Avram

customer_reviews.title: Powerful laptop in a small form factor
customer_reviews.text: There's no denying the power you get from such a small form factor is amazing. However that power comes at a price, battery life. Even running on "Silent" or Windows Powersave mode, doing light tasks like reading PDFs I struggled to get more than 2-3 hours battery. Speaking of "Silent" mode, don't be fooled, the fans can be quite loud, but to be expected when under load. Ultimately had to return as finger print reader developed a hardware fault and Asus think there may be a battery malfunction to get that poor battery life. Had the potential to be the perfect combination of power vs portability.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Answering Common Concerns & Questions
customer_reviews.text: Fans: The fans are loud only when gaming, aside from that they are unnoticeable. There are 5 options, Windows (Completely Automatic): 3 modes(Silent/Performance/Turbo); and Manual. (See the Pictures for more detail) Keyboard: I saw many asking about the keyboard layout so here it is (Att. Picture). I bought the white version and the lighting in the keyboard is not bright at all, it's actually easier to see the keys with the lights off. Plug: It comes only with a UK plug, no adaptor The laptop is great I have had it for a week and the only thing I can critic is the keyboard lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Not as Stated
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this item back as although a very nice computer it did not come with the processor stated, in the settings it says 3750 however it is advertised as 4800. I’ve sent it back for a full refund but it can take up to a month to get it back and as being a uni student I am now without a computer or money. I hope it doesn’t take very long...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The best battery life and most portable gaming laptop I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Great aspects: Good specs Great productivity Great gaming performance Amazing speakers for a 14inch laptop Thin and light Type-C charging Nice to type on Not so good aspects: No webcam Fingerprint sensor kinda iffy sometimes Keyboard back lighting in bright light often makes keys harder to see (but this can be turned off, but is great at night)
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Decent little laptop. Ryzen is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop, perfect size for portability. Heavier than it looks, but games pretty solid. Only advice is upgrade to a 2tb or 4tb m.2 after you purchase. Very good build quality I would say good as or better than macbooks. Fans are not too loud and mine didn't really get too hot while gaming averaging 75c and 38c idle. All in all a decent laptop. Oh yeah the led lid is pretty cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: London Heathrow

customer_reviews.title: Good fast neat Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Battery life seems fine, no comments from my son. Nice thickness too. No camera on this for some strange reason. Anyway, that wasn't a big deal as I prefer the plug in type. Fingerprint is fine. Great laptop for the starting college students!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Killian

customer_reviews.title: Coil Whine . High Idle Temps
customer_reviews.text: The laptop suffers from coil while whenever playing videos. There high temps I am getting when idle are also very upsetting for supposedly the best laptop of the year. Disappointing. Fingerprint reader doesn't work. Decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Started once and never after
customer_reviews.text: Immediately after I received it, I charged and started it to make sure it doesn't have any issues. I installed a couple of apps then turned it off. The next day I tried to start it, but noticed it wouldn't, so I just assumed maybe it didn't have enough battery. I left it to charge for a couple of hours. The day after, I tried again. It still didn't start, even if the charging light was on. I tried the advice on the Asus FAQ page, but none seems to work. Quite dissapointed as a first experience.
customer_reviews.author: Oana V.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR PLAYING FARMVILLE 2
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps some will scorn but there it is: I bought this laptop to play Farmville 2 and it is a DREAM. I don't care about all the technical niceties that some go into - this laptop is FAST & FURIOUS and I have already forgotten the endless hours I spent cursing my old laptop for the endless crashing and freezing. Well done ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: ALOXIS

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The heating was quite inadequate and the device would overheat and thermal-throttle frequently it was frustrating. It’s also slightly overpriced considering the spec. Don’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cany Ping

customer_reviews.title: The fans rattled after 34 days of light use.
customer_reviews.text: The fans are not lubricated properly and therefore the fans rattle during low speed.
customer_reviews.author: PalmTree

customer_reviews.title: Great porduct
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a camera, but if that doesn't bother you it's a really portable and powerful laptop
customer_reviews.author: David Galdea

product_meta.title: ROG Zephyrus G14 G401IA Full HD 14" IPS level Gaming Laptop (AMD Ryzen 5 4600HS, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB, 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD, 8GB RAM, Windows 10, Includes Bag & LAN Dongle)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:White| Style Name:Ryzen 5-4600H + GTX 1650Dynamic and ready to travel the pioneering ROG Zephyrus G14 is the world’s most powerful 14-inch Windows 10 gaming laptop Outclass the competition with a potent GPU that speed through everyday multitasking and gaming Customise your fit with either a 120Hz gaming display or high-resolution WQHD panel both Pantone Validated for superb colour accuracy Quad speakers pump out incredible Dolby Atmos sound for immersive movies games music and more Live life at Zephyrus speed with a light and portable gaming laptop and be active anywhere
feature_bullets: PC Gaming Just Got Smaller But with AMD's latest R5 processor Nvidia's GTX 1650 and Full HD screen there's no need to compromise power for portability
Dynamic and ready to travel the pioneering ROG Zephyrus G14 is the first of its kind 14 Inch Full HD gaming laptop
Outclass the competition AMD's Ryzen 4000 Series CPU and potent GeForce GTX 1650 GPU that speed through everyday multitasking and gaming
The Zephyrus G14 comes with an uncompromised keyboard that fits full-size functionality into a much smaller machine
The Zephyrus G14 changes the game for portability by packing unprecedented power into a 14 Inch body weighing just 1 6 kg
